de.gbv.beacon
Interface BeaconProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
BeaconBuilder
public interface BeaconProcessor

Process a serialized Beacon dump with raw meta fields and link fields. This interface is used by a BeaconParser to process raw meta fields and link fields from a serialized Beacon dump.

See Also:
BeaconHandler

Method Summary
 void processEnd()
          Process the end of a serialized Beacon dump.
 void processLink(String source, String qualifier, String target)
          Processes a serialized Beacon link.
 void processMeta(String name, String value)
          Processes a meta field from a serialized Beacon dump.

void processLink(String source,
                 String qualifier,
                 String target)
                 throws BeaconException
Processes a serialized Beacon link.

Parameters:
source - the source field (must not be empty)
qualifier - the qualifier field (may be empty)
